titleStmt.title: To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends, in and about Lymerick.
titleStmt.author: Bailey, John, 1644-1697.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Baily. May 8, 1684.
Reproductions of originals in: the Harvard University Library and the Congregational Library.

With: (at reel 1415:1b) Man's chief end to glorifie God, or, Some brief sermon notes on I Cor. 10:31 / by the reverend Mr. John Bailey. Boston : Printed by Samuel Green and are to be sold by Richard Wilkins, 1689.
